hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Ammar bin Yasir said:"I became Junub while I was on a camel and I could not find any water, so I rolled in the dust like an animal. I came to the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) and told him about that, and he said: 'Tayammum would have been sufficient for you

chapter.eng-name: Tayammum When One Is Not Traveling
